text: Mazar Hotel is a hotel in Mazar-e-Sharif, Afghanistan. The hotel is decorated in 1930s decor, featuring all high ceilings, grand dining rooms and pillars. Described as a "medium-class" hotel", despite being one of the city's best hotels, in the late 1970s the hotel was said to also accommodate for campers. ==References== Category:Hotels in Afghanistan Category:Mazar-i-Sharif
title: Mazar Hotel
